summary: Adds smithing gear and a basic armory to the proundspire manor in solitude.
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds smithing gear and a basic armory to the proundspire manor in solitude. The gear includes a full forge, workbench, and grindstone. The armory contains wall mounts, display cases,and chests for all your gear. 
NOTE: THE ARMORY IS A ADD ON ROOM, NOT A ROOM CHANGE!
(note:) You need to buy the proudspire manor with all upgrades for it to look right.
To install: Just put it in your Data folder and check it when you start the game.
Let me know if there is any problems and i will fix them asap.
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Version 2 will have more and will be coming in a few weeks.
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Thanks to Bethesda for the game and the Creation kit.
author: agoon69
